hero.title: MAC
hero.about: I am a Full Stack Web Developer, focused on Backend and SAP environments, with experience in Frontend as well. I stand out for my effective communication, teamwork, planning and organization, emotional intelligence, and perseverance. I aim to join projects where I can add value in Backend development and SAP solutions, contributing to success and technological innovation.
